A Pre_defined_datum_axis_3d_symbol is a type of and a type of . A Pre_defined_datum_axis_3d_symbol is a standard representation for a in a 3 dimensional coordinate system.
the associated_element specifies the role of the for the Pre_defined_datum_axis_3d_symbol.

The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
A Pre_defined_datum_plane_3d_symbol is a type of and a type of . A Pre_defined_datum_plane_3d_symbol is a standard representation for a in a 3 dimensional coordinate system. A Pre_defined_datum_plane_3d_symbol shall be parallel with the normal vector of the plane, and shall intersect the plane at the origin of the symbol.
the associated_element specifies the role of the for the Pre_defined_datum_plane_3d_symbol.
